startup: java $( ((USE_AOT_CACHE)) && printf %s "-XX:AOTCache=./HytaleServer.aot" ) -Xms128M $( ((SERVER_MEMORY)) && printf %s "-Xmx${SERVER_MEMORY}M" ) -jar ./HytaleServer.jar $( ((HYTALE_ALLOW_OP)) && printf %s "--allow-op" ) $( ((HYTALE_ACCEPT_EARLY_PLUGINS)) && printf %s "--accept-early-plugins" ) $( ((DISABLE_SENTRY)) && printf %s "--disable-sentry" ) --auth-mode ${HYTALE_AUTH_MODE} --assets ../Assets.zip $( ((HYTALE_BACKUPS)) && printf %s "--backup --backup-dir ./backups --backup-frequency " $( ((BACKUP_FREQUENCY)) && printf %s "${BACKUP_FREQUENCY}" )) --bind 0.0.0.0:${SERVER_PORT}

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash
set -e

mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

if [ "$(uname -m)" = "aarch64" ]; then
  if ! command -v qemu-x86_64 &> /dev/null; then
    apk update && apk add qemu-x86_64
  fi
fi

echo -e "Downloading Hytale Downloader CLI..."

DOWNLOAD_URL="https://downloader.hytale.com/hytale-downloader.zip"

rm -f hytale-downloader.zip
curl -o hytale-downloader.zip $DOWNLOAD_URL
unzip -o hytale-downloader.zip -d hytale-downloader
mv hytale-downloader/hytale-downloader-linux-amd64 hytale-downloader/hytale-downloader-linux
chmod 555 hytale-downloader/hytale-downloader-linux

echo -e "Verifying Hytale Downloader installation..."

if [ "$(uname -m)" = "aarch64" ]; then
  echo -e "Hytale Downloader version: `qemu-x86_64 ./hytale-downloader/hytale-downloader-linux -version`"
else
  echo -e "Hytale Downloader version: `./hytale-downloader/hytale-downloader-linux -version`"
fi

echo -e "Hytale Downloader installed successfully."

variables.name: Disable Sentry
variables.description: Hytale uses Sentry to track crashes. Disable Sentry during active plugin development.

variables.name: Use Ahead-of-Time Cache
variables.description: Hytale provides a pre-trained AOT Java cache which can significantly improve boot times.

variables.name: Install Source Query plugin
variables.description: Installs the Soruce Query plugin, so that your server responds to Source Query A2S requests (player count, server name, etc.)

variables.name: Source Query Port
variables.description: The port that the Source Query plugin will use to respond to A2S requests. This should be different from the main server port. Defaults to the game port + 1.

variables.name: Maximum render distance
variables.description: The maximum render distance to allow the Hytale server to run at.

variables.name: Universe backups
variables.description:
Hytale server attempts to make backups of the universe folder, where the world resides in.
Supported since 2026.01.24-6e2d4fc36

variables.name: Universe backups frequency

Frequency as to how often to create backups (in minutes).
Will not be used if HYTALE_BACKUPS is not enabled.
